title: Watch, WPL final: Delhi Capitals, Mumbai Indians men’s teams send their wishes ahead of title clash
content:
The reason we call it family 🥹💙The wishes are pouring in from our IPL team all the way from Delhi, for our WPL Team 🙌🏻#YehHaiNayiDilli #TATAWPL pic.twitter.com/jepDTJ3UXx— Delhi Capitals (@DelhiCapitals) March 26, 2023

“Mumbai ki ladki full form mein final mein #AaliRe!” 🔥Some special wishes from our #OneFamily ahead of the crunch game. 💙@ImRo45 @surya_14kumar @timdavid8 @TilakV9 @JDorff5 | #MumbaiIndians  #WPL2023 #DCvMI #ForTheW pic.twitter.com/3AzosRsP87— Mumbai Indians (@mipaltan) March 26, 2023
author: Scroll Staff
